alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 14 at 11:12AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River below Mackay Reservoir affecting Custer County. .High mountain snow melt and increased reservoir releases will cause the river flows to become high. Expect minor flooding downstream from the dam. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Localized minor flooding is occurring and is forecast. * WHERE...Big Lost River below Mackay Reservoir. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 3.8 feet, Near bankfull from Mackay Dam through the Darlington Flats. Water is likely to start to seep in low-lying areas in the Darlington Flats. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM MDT Wednesday the stage was 3.9 feet. - Forecast...The river level below the reservoir is expected to remain in action to near minor flood stage for the time being. Localized flooding downstream is ongoing and is expected to continue for at least the next 24 to 48 hours. - Flood stage is 4.3 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 3.9 feet on 06/09/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Big Lost River Mackay Reservoi 4.3 3.9 Wed 9 am MDT 3.9 3.9 3.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
